verbs.description: [ARG1: islamic preacher] [V: jailed] [ARGM-CAU: for isis support released from u k prison anjem choudary a notorious radical islamist who preached hatred of the west in britain was released from prison on friday u k nbc news britain london duncan gardham analyst u s embassy isis society islamic state group u n islamic caliphate state islamic state prison anjem choudary lee] rigby
